hero.h1: Hello! Thanks for being here. It's nice to have you!
hero.p: I'm Grey, a Full Stack developer. Would you like to work together?

about.subtitle: Full stack Developer
about.title: About Me
about.p: I'm a Full Stack Developer with three years of self-taught programming experience, currently in my third year of a Computer Science degree at UTESUR. I specialize in React, Node.js, .NET, and SQL, with a focus on building responsive web applications. Iâ€™ve contributed to open-source projects like Chingu (YumYumYes!, DevEx Tools) using Scrum and Jira, and developed an institutional website for UTESUR with React and .NET while also providing technical support in network setup and hardware maintenance

contact.h2: Do you have a project in mind? Get in touch, and we'll have coffee
contact.successMsg: Thank you for your message, I will be contacting you as soon as possible!

chat: Hello! I'm Grey's virtual assistant. You can ask me about him, and I'll respond based on my knowledge!
